summary: This appears to be a header or cover page for a defense motion for juror name reconsideration filed in the case Sines v. Kessler (17 Civ. 72) in the Western District of Virginia. It is addressed to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, indicating cross-district legal coordination.

keyFacts: The document is a header/cover for a legal filing in the case Sines v. Kessler (Case No. 17 Civ. 72) in the Western District of Virginia.
It is addressed to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, suggesting inter-district legal proceedings or coordination.
The attached file is a defense motion for juror name reconsideration, dated November 3, 2021.
The document identifier EFTA00018372 suggests it is part of a larger document set, potentially related to Epstein case materials.
